Class Deck2

  • java.lang.Object
    • Deck2

  • public class Deck2
extends Object
    Deck2 represents a deck made out of Card class objects

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ArrayList<Card> cards 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deck2()
      Constructor creates an array list of cards and then randomizes them using a switching values for a fixed amount of time which is greater than the total number of cards in a standard deck

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card drawFromDeck()
      drawFromDeck method returns the first object from the deck simulating a draw by removing it from the deck
      int getTotalCards()
      getTotalCards method returns the total number of card from the deck
      String toString()
      toString method returns the first object from the deck simulating a draw by removing it from the deck and changing it to a string

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
